name: SpaceBullet
description:
"SpaceBullet" is my frist game,it is also my studio(ACreativeGame) frist game. I studied making game by myself and also studied creating music .Because i like 2D pixel , i made it. Creativity is what i am after, so i tried to add card system into it so as to make this game more interesting and challenging.

In this game , you need to control a spaceship to defeat your enemy and get your best points .

There are also kinds of bullets appear in your game , if you get a tool,you can change your bullet.
Just like the way to change bullets, you need to get a card tool so as to choose cards to hold the fate of your spaceship.

In addition, to meet my goal , i will make this game more interesting in the future.
